public boolean hasFinishedInitialization()
Has the object we are attached to finished initialization?

finishedInitialization

public void finishedInitialization()
Called when the object we are attached to has finished init. After this point, the callbacks are authoritative for values of config variables, and will be called when values are changed by the user.

setOptions

public void setOptions(SimpleFieldSet sfs)
Set options from a SimpleFieldSet. Once we process an option, we must remove it.

fixOldDefault

public void fixOldDefault(String name,
                          String value)
If the option's value is equal to the provided old default, then set it to the new default. Used to deal with changes to important options where this is not handled automatically because the option's value is written to the .ini.

Parameters:
name - The name of the option.
value - The value of the option.

fixOldDefaultRegex

public void fixOldDefaultRegex(String name,
                               String value)
If the option's value matches the provided old default regex, then set it to the new default. Used to deal with changes to important options where this is not handled automatically because the option's value is written to the .ini.

Parameters:
name - The name of the option.
value - The value of the option.
